Detailed Description

template<typename PC, typename PS = PC>
class geometry::strategy::centroid::geolib1995< PC, PS >

Centroid calculation.

Geolib original version,

Template parameters and concepts: see bashein_detmer
Author:
Barend and Maarten, 1995/1996

Revised for templatized library, Barend Gehrels, 2007

Note:
The results are slightly different from Bashein/Detmer, so probably slightly wrong.
